name: Pending So (Prd)
query:
SELECT 
 so.name as "SO No:Link/Sales Order:100",
 so.transaction_date as "SO Date:Date:90",
 so.delivery_date as "ED Date:Date:90",
 soi.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:150",
 soi.description as "Description::450",
 (soi.qty - ifnull(soi.delivered_qty, 0)) as "Pending Qty:Float:70"

from
 `tabSales Order` so, `tabSales Order Item` soi
where
 soi.`parent` = so.`name`
 and so.status != "Closed"
 AND so.docstatus = 1
 and so.transaction_date <= curdate()
 and ifnull(soi.delivered_qty,0) < ifnull(soi.qty,0)
order by so.transaction_date desc
